item.description: Sell or trade, this flawless P220 German Sig Sauer. Never carried, finish is almost perfect. Has Sig lite night sights and 3 Sig Sauer magazines. In box with manual. Dead eye accurate! You simply will not find a nicer example for the age anywhere (95-96) 931-309-7588 Please, no calls or text after 10 pm. Thanks!

item.title: (Minneapolis / St. Paul) Beretta PX4 Storm with Ammo/Holster - $ 500
item.description:
Selling a lightly used Beretta PX4 Storm 9mm. The gun's been fired about 100 times and has sat in the safe the last year or so. The gun is in wonderful condition and comes with 2 factor magazines, factory case, factory manual/brush, leather carry holster and 100 rounds of 9mm ammunition.
I'll be in Duluth on Saturday so I'm willing to potentially meet up there to sell.
$500 Firm. Must have PTP/PTC and sign a Bill of Sale.
Dealers sell these new for $525 plus tax and they don't include the holster or the ammo.
I also have some extra 9mm I'd be willing to sell for between $13-$15 per box of 50 if you're interested.

item.description: I have a ruger 10/22 with black receiver and stainless barrell. has a simmons 22 mag 4*32 scope on it that is silver. comes with a ruger 10/22 case and a 30 round extended magazine. Call or text 251-599-9976. for pictures and details. 325 or best offer. I kniow exactly what this gun is worth so no low ballers

item.title: (Greenville) SAR PASP 12 gauge 12G Shotgun Tactical New in Box Never Fired - $ 350
item.description: This is a NIB, never-fired SAR Arms SARPASP shotgun. It has a muzzle breach, brake flash suppressor, synthetic stock/forearm, soft pistol grip, ghost-ring rear sight, and fiber-optic front sight. The brake is removable, and can be replaced with any Benelli choke. Remington magazine extension tubes also fit this gun. This shotgun is imported by EAA for United States Sporting Goods, and is manufactured in Turkey by Sarsilmar Arms - a major supplier to the Turkish Army.

item.title: (Racine) ARCHANGEL 10/22 16" Threaded Stainless Steel Barrel - $ 585
item.description: Brand new never fired Ruger 10/22 w/Archangel tactical stock. This stock is kick ass on this gun. It has the shorter 16" threaded barrel w/ the mini-14 flash suppressor. Also this has upper and side rails for mounting red dots, scopes, lights, lazers. I have a lazer/light combo w/red light lens for illumination w/o giving away your position. Im asking $585obo. I am open to all reasonable trades and offers. Just shoot me an e-mail.

item.title: (Broward) COME SEE OUR WALL OF HOLSTERS - Offer
item.description:
Hello South Florida! We are Pompano Beach's newest gun store, located in the heart of south Pompano Beach. We have a great variety of ammunition including 9mm, 22LR, 40, 223, 556, 762X39, 30-06, 243, 380, and much more! We offer Tagua and Blackhawk holsters, Hogue grips for revolvers and semi autos, we have Magpul accessories for your rifles.
We offer survival products such as gas masks, full body suits to protect from radiation, wise food buckets that have a shelf life of over 20 years, handgun and rifle cleaning kits, knives of all kinds and world class customer service you should expect from your local gun store! Please give us a call or stop by the store! We can order just about any gun and we are also a full service Class III dealer!
We charge 35$ for gun transfers and 75$ for Class III transfers. We also offer Conceal Carry classes and gunsmithing! We are full service!
Stop by if you're in the area or give us a call today!!
http://TACTGUNS.COM 161 SOUTH CYPRESS ROAD, POMPANO BEACH, FLORIDA, 33060 954-580-7314 TACTICALFIREARMSFFL@GMAIL.COM

item.title: (Cincinnati) 1951 Russian SKS w. Knife-Type Bayonet - $ 499
item.description: This rifle is a hard to find Russian-Made SKS (not Chinese / Yugo) made in Russia in 1951 at the Tula Armory. Knife-type folding bayonet. Actual Hardwood stock. I've had it nearly 15 years and only had it out to the range 4X for a total of about 150 rounds fired through it. Comes w. standard 10 shot mag + some stripper clips I can include. Cleaning kit that is stored in the butt of the rifle. Weapon functions great. Its a really fun gun. Fires standard 7.62 X 39 rounds of course. Only selling to fund another project (AK47). Make a cash offer or willing to trade for an AK... I can add some $ as well if needed. Please keep in mind this is Russian version when considering offers / trades. Thx for looking.
